name: slashtags-js
description: JavaScript implementation of the Slashtags protocol

scripts.lint: npx standard scripts/*.js examples/**/*.js --fix && lerna run lint
scripts.reset: lerna run clean && rimraf packages/*/node_modules node_modules packages/*/package-lock.json
scripts.testnet:start: pm2 start scripts/setup-testnet.js || echo 'Testnet already running'
scripts.testnet:close: pm2 delete scripts/setup-testnet.js || echo 'Testnet not running'
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run depcheck && npm run test
